name: Mini Mini Games EN V1.0
description:
Click here for the game on Scratch

⭐️Controls⭐️

 All instructions are in the game except

 Click on: G to see the high score

              H to make the high score disappear

              N to see your score

              M to make your score disappear

 ⭐️Instruction⭐️

 Click the button of a game read the instruction and play the Mini Game

⭐️Changelog⭐️

 Feb 22, 2022: Release :)

 ⭐️Credit️⭐️

 The game remember now it has a lot of things from the game Onthoud is Goud by @Daan_Luminous

 ⭐️Feedback⭐️

 Are there any bugs you find or ideas you have or other feedback?  Please put them in the comments.
